sentences.en: 10,000 deaths a year from chronic lung disease are attributable to smoking.
sentences.cn: 吸烟导致每年有1万人死于慢性肺病。

sentences.en: Acid rain is not straightforwardly attributable to the burning of coal.
sentences.cn: 酸雨并非简单地由烧煤造成。

sentences.en: And the biggest profits are attributable to the most advanced devices.
sentences.cn: 其中最大收益来自于最高级的设备.

sentences.en: Are attributable to silence all sound, all noises are as soft music.
sentences.cn: 一切声响都归于沉寂, 一切噪音都化为轻柔的乐曲.

sentences.en: But how many of Drogba's haul are directly attributable to Shevchenko?
sentences.cn: 但是有多少德罗巴努力的结果可直接归功于舍瓦?

sentences.en: Direct damage to structures attributable to air blast can take various forms.
sentences.cn: 空中爆震对建筑结构物造成的直接破坏可能有多种形式.

sentences.en: Evidently the wave properties of light are not attributable to the beam acting as a whole.
sentences.cn: 显然光的波动性质不能归给光束整体.

sentences.en: His illness is attributable to overwork.
sentences.cn: 他的病可归因于劳累过度.

sentences.en: In each case, the level of cell multiplication attributable to zeatin is shown.
sentences.cn: 每种情况都表明归因于玉米素的细胞繁殖水平.

sentences.en: Is this painting attributable to Michelangelo?
sentences.cn: 这幅画是米开朗琪罗画的 吗 ?

sentences.en: The collapse of the movement was attributable to a lack of morale.
sentences.cn: 这项运动的失败可以归因于士气低沉.

sentences.en: The error in the calculation was attributable to rounding.
sentences.cn: 计算中的错误源于舍入.

sentences.en: The researchers found that 78 % of hepatocellular carcinoma was attributable to Hepatitis infections.
sentences.cn: 研究人员发现,78%肝细胞癌是肝炎感染造成.

sentences.en: The variations found are attributable to well - defined geochemical processes.
sentences.cn: 已知的各种变化都属于一定的地球化学过程.

sentences.en: Their illnesses are attributable to a poor diet.
sentences.cn: 他们的病可能是不良饮食所致。

trans.tran_en: likely to have been caused by something
